Description_lang: Archmage Vargoth has sent his image back in time to assist you and research Draenor's past.
AuraDescription_lang: Archmage Vargoth has sent his image back in time to assist you and research Draenor's past.

name_blz.zh_TW: 追隨者：大法師瓦戈斯的影像
name_blz.zh_CN: 追随者：大法师瓦格斯的影像

description_blz.en_US: Archmage Vargoth has sent his image back in time to assist you and research Draenor's past.
description_blz.es_MX: El archimago Vargoth envió su imagen en el tiempo para ayudarte e indagar sobre el pasado de Draenor.
description_blz.pt_BR: O Arquimago Vargoth enviou um duplo ao passado para ajudar você e para pesquisar o passado de Draenor.
description_blz.de_DE: Erzmagier Vargoth hat sein Abbild in die Vergangenheit geschickt, um Euch zu helfen und Draenors Vergangenheit zu erforschen.
description_blz.en_GB: Archmage Vargoth has sent his image back in time to assist you and research Draenor's past.
description_blz.es_ES: El archimago Vargoth ha hecho retroceder su imagen en el tiempo para ayudarte e investigar el pasado de Draenor.
description_blz.fr_FR: L’archimage Vargoth a fait remonter le temps à son image pour vous aider à étudier le passé de Draenor.
description_blz.it_IT: L'Arcimago Vargoth ha inviato una sua immagine nel passato per aiutarti in battaglia e indagare sul passato di Draenor.
description_blz.ru_RU: Верховный маг Варгот отправил свою проекцию назад во времени, чтобы помочь вам исследовать прошлое Дренора.
description_blz.ko_KR: 대마법사 바르고스가 당신을 돕고 드레노어의 과거를 조사하기 위해 시간을 거슬러 자신의 환영을 보냈습니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 大法師瓦戈斯將他的影像送回過去以協助你，同時研究德拉諾的過往。
description_blz.zh_CN: 大法师瓦格斯派其影像回到过去协助你，并研究德拉诺的历史。
